up in the sky

Un juego muy recomendado, yo me lo termine pronto es lo que pasa, me duro 10 horas como lo que estan viendo, es un poco corto, pero tiene otro final (creo) porque tenia 2 lugares para elegir y ver aunque creo que es lo mismo. Me gusto el modo de ''combate'' que es de andar moviendote por los lados, es muy recomendado a mi gusto, se le pueden dar algunas horas mas en otras dificultades. Muy entretenido para que lo termine al primer día.

Man what can I say about this game...

Story:
Now this game is slightly confusing plot wize as it covers very interesting themes making it honestly a blast throughout the game often making referances to prior installments in the franchise. The only neggative part of the story is the ending which many people hate including myself as Bookers death at the end is really out of place and random considering that plot didn't seem to be leading to this and Elizabeth straight up killed him. In the DLC she says she misses booker and I completely flipped as SHE WAS THE ONE WHO KILLED HIM!!!!

Characters:
Not much to say about the characters as they are all interesting and well developed and I don't really hate any of them which is good. Booker is my favourite as he is a good fleshed out main character with a good amount of mystery to him.

Graphics/design:
This game is beautiful. For a game released in 2013 it is stunning and can rival many games today making each location you go to feel so alive and colourful (unless its the DLC).

Gameplay:
The gameplay is what to be expected from a Bioshock being realitivly fast paced with a good amount of enemys to fight along the way. Boss fights in this game can sometimes be way to hard as I have to sort of slowly damge some of the bosses hiding in the corner in order to win which can sometimes be annoying. Other than that the upgrades and money system is fine and enjoyable.

Overall:
Overall I think you should totally play this game as it is my favourite from the series BY FAR. It is currently only £10.79 for the game as it is the summer sale and will save you A LOT OF MONEY! 

9/10 - Just let down by the ending (Also I am really sick of Rapture)

无限的地图相比于生化奇兵第一作要简化不少，并取消了小地图的设计，地图的探索部分大大的减少，这在我看来是减一分的。
取消了能随身带血包和蓝药的设计，并且一次性只能带两把枪，很多情况都不能轻松应付，这蹩脚的战斗系统再减一分。

但是现在还能有几个游戏能把细节做到如此细致？能让地图上的每一处角落都值得细细品味？加一分

结尾神转折，加一分

伊丽莎白太可爱了！加100分，好评！

Идеальная игра про неидеальный мир.

В этой игре прекрасно практически всё, придраться можно только к боевой системе, но лично я в ней значительных недостатков не нашёл. История более продуманная чем здесь, благодаря связи с предыдущими частями, до сих пор не приходит на ум. То, насколько интересен сюжет, насколько много в нём мелких деталей и то, насколько хорошо переданы отношения между персонажами - как минимум выдавит из вас слезу. 
Актёрская игра просто безупречна. Трой Бейкер и Кортни Дрейпер озвучили главных героев очень эмоционально. 
Концовка же и стала главным спонсором мозговых штурмов начала 2013 года, как и запланировал Кен Левин, жаждая понаблюдать за тем, как игроки пытаются разобраться в сюжете его игры, разбирая все мелкие детали.
Также стоит сказать пару слов про сам город. Колумбия играет ключевую роль в истории Элизабет и Букера. Город, словно живой организм, по началу кажется нам настоящим раем на земле: люди ходят по улице улыбаясь, все очень приветливые, везде очень яркие и приятные цвета, но потом Колумбия показывает своё истинное лицо. 

DLC
Оба дополнения Burial at sea крайне рекоммендую к прохождению. Только после их прохождения, история откроется вам с другой стороны, закрыв практически все вопросы, которые у вас могли появиться, во время прохождения серии Bioshock. Конец второй части Burial at sea точно заставит вас прослезиться, а если вы играли в первую часть серии, то в голове у вас будет только печаль, скорбь, и вопрос "Почему всё должно было быть именно так?".

Оценивать данную игру по балльной системе я считаю некорректным. Я могу лишь сказать, что это история, с которой должны познакомиться даже те, кто далёк от игровой индустрии.
una obra maestra de juego

Oyunu 8-9 saat civarında bitirdim.Oyunun oynanışı güzeldi.Hikayesi efsane ötesi olmuşki beyin patlatan bi son içeriyo.Şu ana kadar görebileceğiniz en güzel hikayelerden biri olucaktır.Tek olumsuz yanı oyunun biraz kısa olması keşke daha uzun olsaymış.İndirimlerde kaçırılmaması gereken bir oyun.9/10

INTRODUCTION:

Bioshock: Infinite takes a bold step away from the themes of the previous two installments of the series in terms of story telling and artstyle.
We enter the game as Booker DeWitt, a 'War Hero' turned private investigator that has been given the fairly simple task of finding a young girl and bringing her back to his employers to wipe away his gambling debts that have occurred as a result of the trauma of his service.

ART & GRAPHICS:

The art style of this game is a massive contrast to that of Bioshock 1 & 2, switching from the run down and eerie nature of the first games to a bright and seemingly positive environment of Colombia, the flying city that broke from the United States as we learn throughout various lore objects within the levels. This switch seems on the surface as if the game itself will take a different turn than the first games however we quickly learn of the undertones of deep violence and cult-like nature of the city and its citizens.

GAMEPLAY:

Gameplay is smooth and rewarding, especially with efficient use of the returning 'Plasmids' that give Booker all of the tools he needs to gain an edge in combat. The railway riding also opens up the environment massively and allows for a much more expansive combat experience that leaves the player feeling there is nowhere restricted to the fighting potential within each level.
With Elizabeth also providing assistance later in the game with her range of abilities, combat is further improved and streamlined so that any player worth their mettle can fashion the perfect situations in which they can gain an advantage (and survive on hardest difficulty or challenge playthroughs).
Collectables in the form of audio tapes that provide lore as to the rise and morphing of Columbia from a US state in to the cult-ran dystopia of Comstock are challenging however not tedious to find and are voice acted, an especially pleasing touch as going out of your way to learn the game's deeper messages are rewarded with quality content creation and attention to detail.

STORY:

The story is one that can leave a player of any intellect sat in pure confusion, trying desperately to decipher the cyrptic messages of the Lutece twins and the backstory behind Booker being a prophecised evil to come and steal away the girl in the Bird Tower.
Though some do not enjoy a story that has more to it than is told directly to the Protaganist and with no linear chain of events that lead up to the ending, it is a pleasant break from the norm in that once looked at on a wider scale the story itself does make a great deal of sense and all ties in nicely (a feature that also plays in to the DLC's).

CONCLUSION:

Overall, Bioshock: Infinite as a step away from the norm of the Trilogy, however remains pleasing to play with a rewarding combat system and a charming artstyle.
The game never reached its full potential as we have learned over the years through developers explaining how complex the game truly was meant to be, and how it would have actually been enough content for multiple games in one. Despite this, the story does not suffer nor do combat mechanics, and therefore the game still holds its position as a complete and enjoyable title.

Literally the best game ever made. I couldn't stop playing once i picked it up and beat it twice after that. It's not the longest game but the atmosphere will suck you in and keep you engaged for hours upon hours. This installment took at drastically different route than its predecessors but I believe it was a turn for the better. When I first opened this game, before I even started a save, the graphics had already impressed me, despite me buying it sometime in 2016. The characters are excellent and the plot will turn your head in circles. The gameplay is excellent. The shooting is nice. The antagonist is relatable enough to not be a cookie-cutter bad guy but not to the point at which you don't hate what he stands for and tries to do to you. The plot doesn't try to force ideas into your head, it just shows what happens when the ideas are put into place. This game is a must play and will never stop being my favorite. 11/10. I cannot reccomend this game enough. Do yourself a favor and buy it.

[b]"Acıların gün ışığına çıkarıldığı yerde eninde sonunda doğruluk hüküm sürecektir[/b]
[b] Hikaye [/b]
Ana karakterimiz Booker Dewit,Yaşadığı trajik olaylardan işini kaybedip içki ve kumar batağına düşmüş bir  özel dedektifdir,Günlerini boş boş geçiren Booker bir gün ofisine gelen Robert Lutece'nin teklifiyle yapıçak bir iş bulur.Lutece Booker'dan Columbia adlı şehre gidip Elizabeth adındaki kızı getirmesini ister.Eğer Booker bu işi yaparsa tüm kumar borçları silinicektir.Booker çaresiz kaldığından bu görevi kabul eder ve Columbia'ya doğru yolculuğa çıkar.Bilmediği ise Columbia'nın kendini mesih ilan etmiş faşist ırkçı Comstock tarafından yönetilmesi.
[b] Oynanış [/b]
Oyunda iki farklı saldırı tipi bulunuyor.Bunlardan biri klasik saldırı diğeriyse özel güçlerimiz Vigor'larla saldırı eski oyunlarda istediğimiz kadar silah taşıyabilirken, Booker sadece 2 silah taşıyor.Vigorlar'da durum eskisi gibi 8 vigordan sadece 2 tanesini kullanabiliyoruz.Oyunda Gear adı verilen sağda solda bulabileceğiniz upgradeler var aynı anda 3 parça giyebiliyosunuz ve hepsi farklı farklı özellikler veriyor örneğin:yakın saldırıyla birini öldürünce canınızın tamlanması,her adam öldürdüğünüzde silahınızın vurduğu hasarın atması gibi şeyler bunlar.Silahları da uprgade edebiliyoruz silahın vurduğu hasarı arttırma,silahın mermi kapasitesini arttırma gibi şeyler.Oyunda birde Elizabeth var elizabeth düşündüğüm gibi bizim korumamıza muhtaç sürekli ağlayan bir karakter değilmiş.Savaşlarda bize can,cephane,para buluyor,bazende diğer dünyalardan turret,silah,çağırıyor.
Oyunda en beğendiğim mekaniklerden biri olan skylinedanda bahsedelim.İlk oyunda yakın dövüşte kullandığımız alet bir ingiliz anahtarıydı bu oyunda kolumuza taktığımız bir kancayı kullanıyoruz.Kanca hem yakın dövüş aleti olarak hemde Sky Line'ları kullanmak için kullanıyoruz.Bu şöyle oluyor Columbia'nın dünyasında yolculuk için bulunduğunuz yerin üzerine hava demir yolları yapılmış elimizdeki kanca ile bu raylara tutunarak kayıyoruz.
[b] Atmosfer ve Grafik [/b]
Columbia gerçekten çok canlı hissetiriyor etrafda dans eden insanlar,sahilde yüzen ve güneşlenen insanlarla karşılaşmak mümkün ve bunu harika bir grafik ile resmedince cok daha güzel bir atmosfer açığa çıkıyor Sky Line ile gezerken etrafdan gözümü alamadım karakter modellemeleride hiç fena değil 
[b] Son Karar [/b]
Atmosfer 10/10
Grafik 10/9
Oynanış 10/8,5
Hikaye 10/10

I didnt like much Bioshock 2 for some reason, I enjoyed playing it but I felt like there was something missing in the game and Bioshock Infinite solves that problem.
Talking about the gameplay, which I dont think its much relevant in this game since the story its all that matters here, I tried to set everything up to fell like I was playing cs:go so I could one tap everyone and it worked! I really loved the gameplay style (I mainly used the basic pistol and the first riffle we get, powers I used only crows that are overpowered and sometimes the possession one).
Im someone who likes to explore the whole game as much as I can and thats what I tried to do and this way my understanding of the ending was easier. So if you´re gonna play this game please pay attention to everything in the game, not only cutscenes but also the dialogues that you have with Elizabeth!
The story is amazing and I love games with rich story telling like this one. For me the ending of this game was kinda like the NieR:Automata one, everything is falling apart in front of your eyes and all you feel is sadness!
I was expecting this game to give me some guys to one tap but it gave me feels instead...
I highly recommend the game <3

这款游戏剧情确实很有深度，让人沉迷其中，整个景色的布置也充满艺术文化气息，总之非常优秀。（游戏的结尾与开头呼应的很好，简直精妙，中间部分不会让你觉得无聊，剧情很紧凑，当然细究下来也是有点小bug的）
至于战斗系统我也给好评，我的第一感觉是这种操作方式跟羞辱系列是一样的，事实的确如此，不会感觉很别扭与不适应，当然习惯于右键开镜的fps玩家还是先努力习惯一下吧。
画面整体浓艳，虽说是为了渲染哥伦比亚天空城的气氛，但是还是有些晃眼，有3d眩晕的同学们要注意调好设置了。当然画面还是很优秀的，细节表现很到位，伊丽莎白的各种动作表情真的很丰富传神，给个赞。
音乐没有特别突出，但也不会让你失望，整体氛围渲染适当，战斗中的音效很到位，没有出现违和感。


最后，关于结局，我个人不是很赞同，我觉得没必要把自己的过去抹杀，再多的悲剧都是某种程度上的历史必然性，躲得过这次，终究逃不过历史必然的进程，逆转未来改天命这种事不存在的。

Bref, je le recomande même si la fin estéco+

If you're looking into getting this game, I would wait for a steam sale because of the shorter story, but all around a great game and (even though it's short) a epic story.

Kesinlikle oynanması gereken bir oyun..

Игра шедевр! Отходняк от неё очень длительный, она заставляет ещё долго думать о ней. Долго не мог уснуть после концовки, и не удивительно! Тут и эмоции и вопросы, вызывающие все игры и кино на тематику времени. И всегда остаются вопросы, вопросы... Время одно из самых сложных и неразгаданных вещей, и самый ценный ресурс нашей жизни. Увы, жажда узнать тайну намного ускорила процесс и я даже не успевал "смаковать" геймплей, но это уже проблема всех интригующих проектов. До миссии с защитой дирижабля прошёл на средних на Стим геймпаде, вполне реально, но та миссия явно отличается уровнем сложности от других, так что переключился на новичка дабы быстрее узреть концовку. Советую всем к покупке, даже тем кто не любитель данного жанра. Ну и конечно же 10/10, по другому и быть даже не должно. Звуковое сопровождение концовки уровень Голливуд, досих пор из головы не вылазят 2 композиции, Elizabeth и Baptism.

Ну и конечно же из головы не выйдет концовка 2го эпизода Burial at Sea, жаль, очень жаль. С этими двумя DLC получил ответ по поводу привязывания Соловья к Элизабет и Сестричек к Большим Папочкам, но в придачу опять же новые вопросы и путаницу в голове.

This is not just a game, it is much more. Everything was so well done, the voice actors brought every character to life, the weapons and speels made combat fun and unique, the graphics gives every place charm and authenticity, but the story is the one that really stands out. As you go through it, you become more and more attached to Elizabeth and she becomes a real partner while finding many details and puns which make the the story deeper and more interesting. The ending was so great and i haven't met bugs. I recommend it to anybody. It is a game worth playing and buying!

从来没有一个角色能够让我觉得如此迷人。
伊丽莎白一定是这个世界上最可爱的角色之一，也是令人动情的角色。不知道有多少人面对伊丽莎白被夜莺带走时哭泣的脸感到心痛呢？[spoiler] 什么？你敢动我女儿？还他妈做实验插管子？去你妈的掩体，去你妈的战术，去你妈的射击精度，你们今天都得死！	[/spoiler]
我不知道何时在哪一款游戏当中，才能再找到进入天空城时那句哈利路亚带给我的震撼。何时再能找到一个让我觉得可爱到真的愿意奋不顾身的去营救她的女孩子。
伊丽莎白，游戏艺术的女儿。
我终于明白了何为第九艺术。除了相见恨晚，无他言可说

我老婆凭什么要让你们看？

ps：阿什利你看看人家，跟着男主不仅不会碍事，还帮着收集子弹药水，你再看看你。。。
刚玩完了主篇， 说实话， 玩完后，我恶补了一些历史知识后才完全明白游戏的意思，游戏非常不错，光影效果不错，每个场景都做的很精细， 玩起来是种享受，推荐大家玩玩，我继续去玩DLC了。
其实没有别人说的那么溜，不过这个游戏的确好玩，深刻思想什么的我以后再补

BioShock Infinite предложит вам:
а) Прекрасную Элизабет.
б) Завораживающий мир Колумбии, парящей в небесах.
в) Проработанное окружение, наполненное разными приятными мелочами (голосовые записи, диалоги обитателей небесного города, плакаты на стенах и так далее)
г) Динамичный и бодрый геймплей, позволяющий почувствовать себя настоящей машиной для убийств.
д) Море впечатлений и пищи для размышлений после всего того, что вы впитаете в себя в течение прохождения истории, которая не даст вам положить свой донг на игру до самой последней катсцены.

Покупать без скидки, покупать со скидкой.
Но покупать в любом случае!

여름할인중에 32000원짜리를 8000원주고 샀다.졸라 재밌다.얼른 사셈 가성비 ㅆㅅㅌㅊ
솔직히 원가주고도 사서 할 개명작.

Bioshock Infinite was amazing and one of the best times I've ever had playing a game. Irrational Games have found the perfect formula for it, almost flawless gameplay, graphics and sound plus a mysterious story about a broken city of gold but where the game goes beyond its predecessors is with the inclusion of one of the most realistc AI characters to have ever grace a game. Elizabeth is what made Bioshock Infinite awesome! Enough said.. go and buy this game now because Booker DeWitt has a whole metropolis of propaganda to annihilate.
玩了一天了 快吐了  ...还有就是小姐姐超有气质 这是我见过最好的队友

El unico 10/10 que he jugado en toda mi vida como videojugador . tienes que tener si o si este juego en tu biblioteca imprescindible. edit : despues de terminar los dlc´s puedo confimar que es una obra maestra en todos los sentidos

el soundtrack si eres amante del swing / jazz te va a encantar 

los graficos aunque sea un del 2013 si tienes un buen equipo los vas a drisfrutar muchisimo parando a cada rato para admirar los paisajes de columbia / rapture 

ten out of fucking ten

Plus:
Female partner 
Main character is fine
Marvellous music
Beautifull locations
Skills and equipment for statistics
...
...
...
and  boobs, of course
为了伊丽莎白补上机票
好故事，好游戏
good game
Esto no es un juego, esto es una "Obra Maestra" algo hermoso, desde lo grafico hasta la historia, el mejor juego que jugado y le he dedicado tiempo y atencion a la historia.

Das Hauptspiel lohnt sich, allerdings sollte man sich für 7,50€ nicht die Erweiterung Episode 1 holen,
Episode 1 ist nur eine oder 2 "Karten" mit ein bißchen Handlung, Epsiode 2 "lohnt" sich schon eher hier ist mehr drinne, es gibt auch eine zusammenfassung "Video" zu Epsiode 1.

Aber egal wie man es dreht alles Erweiterungen zusammen sind nicht einmal 1/4 des Hauptspieles.

Es ist einfach nur raus geschmissenes Geld, nur wer wirklich unbedingt wissen möchte wie es, geht. Sollte sich die Erweiterungen holen.

Viel Spaß

This Game is a masterpiece.

The Game has the graphics , Gameplay , The Epic story , and The Fucking Twist!
I love The Wingmen mechanics.. The way they created it, it really feels like you have a partner with you... 
the Skyline mechanics, i fucking love it too...  Its just amazing , you can even be creative how to kill your opponents! so far no negative parts i seen in the game, i love the voice acting , the villians , The nostalgic Atmosphere... 
I love it all! The Gameplay! The Action! The Comedy! The supernatural powers! The Shootout! The Badass executions! The Goodside of non-stealth Game! I love it all, especially, Elizabeth!  Elizabeth has it all! The Perfect Waifu Material! The Perfect Partner of all time! 

It`s just Amazing guys.... Bioshock Infinity... Best Games in this Era...
i love it... love Elizabeth <3

Rating? dafaq rating, it`s a masterpiece! But still if you insist...

13.5/10

Awesome game! Love it! A game similar to "The Last of Us" in regards to guiding an unfortunate young lady to safety.
Also has some really well done 'modes of transportation/movement' with Great graphics.
If you don't like this game, you're a wanker
第一次碰到了喜欢的ai、、以为会是老套的恋爱戏没想到居然是伦理剧

我打了11.2个小时算是白玩了。。。。。
因为卡在三个裂隙，最后一个死活找不到，指路系统把我带到一个不明区域后开始转圈
真的让我感到很失望。
这bug比育碧还致命。
伊丽莎白是我玩下去的唯一动力

神作！
非常棒的剧情（需要dlc和第一部才可以感受到完整的，宏大的，缜密的，有趣的整个世界观）
非常棒的人设，伊丽莎白简直棒到不行，太喜欢了！！！
非常棒的游戏性，魔法和各种枪械以及环境的配合可以有丰富的打法，手感也非常棒
美中不足是后期到剧情推动迅速的阶段有一些带有重复性质的战斗拖慢了游戏节奏，没有让玩家的情感体验达到最好的状态。个人觉得应该加入一点巧妙的短时间战斗来代替后期人多的大场景战斗

我们无法改变剧情，只是见证故事。。
有时候我在想让伊丽莎白在海滩上一直跳下去是不是个完美结局

(时隔三年，当我打完了生化奇兵的前两部再回来打这一部时，还是能体验到剧情带来的深深的震撼，这部游戏是我心目中当之无愧的最佳游戏，谢谢你irrational games，谢谢你肯列文——2021.8.20)
请问对白有没有中文字幕的？

Bioshock infinite sin duda el mejor fps que eh jugado ,excelente historia, graficos buenos, lo mas destacable es el desarrollo de personajes que tiene, la jugabilidad y la musica uff pero que todo en este juego es perfecto y no es cuestion de perspectivas que a cualquera le gustara que un juego de los que ya no hay, la historia no es lo mismo que veras en la mayoria de videojuegos, me rompio la cabeza al comienzo :v, compralo ya con sus dlc pero para entenderlo bien juega los 2 primeros tambien que son buenos muy buen precio.

Hace mucho que no sentía esa sensación al jugar a un videojuego. Bioshock Infinite tapa la boca a cualquiera que se atreva a decir que los videojuegos no son arte, una auténtica obra maestra (no es perfecta), pero sin duda si hay algún ejemplo al cual siempre recurriré para hablar de la complejidad y el potencial que tiene este medio siempre será éste.

Lamentablemente no puedo hablar en profundidad de éste título, pues es algo que cada uno tiene que experimentar por si mismo, solo diré que tiene unos gráficos preciosos, música y ambientación excelentes, jugabilidad muy cómoda y una historia digna de analizarse por todos.

Bioshock Infinite e o ultimo da Franquia Bioshock. Apresentando o mesmo tema com outra interpretação, Infinite abre um mar infinito(Por isso  o nome infinite) de variedade. Aqui os plasmids mudaram de nome para Vigors mas basicamente e a mesma função. O game e bem casual, vc pode explorar a cidade flutuante para procurar dinheiro e outros afins. ou vc pode ser bem linear e acabar com tudo. 
O Fim do game vai explodir sua cabeça

伊丽莎白小姐姐
很虐心的游戏，真是没有勇气通关第二遍。
没有玩过游戏的其他系列，就这部而言，真的是可以称得上神作。良好的手感，超级喜欢的画面，完整，令人惊叹的剧情。
买就对了
一路上小姐姐扶持 帮助，我们也见证着相互的成长
很难有别的游戏会再给我这样的感觉
ps：11小时通关，网络问题没同步好

FPS con increible historia, increibles personajes, increible música, increible apartado gráfico, increibles escenarios, increible todo.

Señoras y señores, ¡esto es una OBRA MAESTRA!
